It's miko. I totally made Melanie freak when I asked her who she was at school. When she told me I said "ooooooohhhhhhh! It's you!" she looked at me funny, and then remembered what I was talking about. it was awesome!

:-D Heehee. It's Mel again. Everybody start calling Walt Walty! Mwahahaha! See, I TOLD you I'd be back. I still haven't gotten over meeting Michael and when I said I was Melanie Berk, he went, "Ooooohh..." Like, "So you're the one..." Creepy. But not as creepy as Mrs. Hood. *Insert Shudder Here* Oh, and Walt, I don't feel like replying to your email. So yes, the redneck's name was one of those. I think. Yeup. Peace out hehe, Much love guys, `~*Mel*~`
Did you hear about that girl who blogged during hurricane? that's insane, yet strangely awesome.
You know, I've been thinking. I know that nearly all of you know of the pivotal show/manga that sparked all anime called Astro Boy . Why does he never wear a shirt? It's just wrong.
I sent invites to all my friends, but only one has answered with just one little post. If you're reading this, friends, then check your email from Miko the Hamtako.
i was looking at random profiles today, and i never knew how many people love manga as much as I do. It's amazing. Japan is slowly taking over the U.S. culturally. i love ramen.
My mom is WAY overprotective. she thinks that something will happen to us just because I used her phone as my audioblog #. she always does stuff like this.

My mom really needs to get up to date with the latest things. She doesn't have the slightest idea what a manga is. she knows theyre books, and thats about it. whenever i am bothering her, she says,"Michael, go read your Mangos!" mangos! My god!
